title: Welcome to Distill!!! :~)
description:
Welcome to our new blog, Distill!!! :~). We hope you enjoy

title: Some stuff!
description: A short description of the post.
contents:
Look at this cool plot! Different font!


library(tidyverse)

mtcars %>% 
  ggplot(aes(disp, mpg)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth() +
  labs(title = "cool!")



  theme(text = element_text(family = "Roboto")) # would work if I had this downloaded I guess


List of 1
 $ text:List of 11
  ..$ family       : chr "Roboto"
  ..$ face         : NULL
  ..$ colour       : NULL
  ..$ size         : NULL
  ..$ hjust        : NULL
  ..$ vjust        : NULL
  ..$ angle        : NULL
  ..$ lineheight   : NULL
  ..$ margin       : NULL
  ..$ debug        : NULL
  ..$ inherit.blank: logi FALSE
  ..- attr(*, "class")= chr [1:2] "element_text" "element"
 - attr(*, "class")= chr [1:2] "theme" "gg"
 - attr(*, "complete")= logi FALSE
 - attr(*, "validate")= logi TRUE
